title: Handle a Seller's Counter Offer
description: A seller has responded to a buyer's offer with a counter offer. The agent must present it to the buyer.

tasks.description: Receive the counter offer from the listing agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves the counter offer document.

tasks.description: Analyze the changes in the counter offer (e.g., increased price, shortened contingency period).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately identifies all changes from the original offer.

tasks.description: Clearly explain the new terms to the buyer client and advise them on how to respond (accept, reject, or counter back).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear communication and strategic advice to the buyer.
